title: Soldier
lyrics:
Tell me one more time
Wanna taste it on your mouth
Burnin' up your mind
Fever when you're comin' down
Crossin' every line
Yeah, I'd do it all for you, ooh



Climbin' like a vine

Cut me off like sugarcane

Damn, you get me high

Sweep me up like hurricane

Never say goodbye

Yeah, I'd do it all for you, yeah



Ain't nobody know ya'

Like I fuckin' know ya'

Ain't nobody hold ya'

Like I hold ya'

When you're feelin' low, yeah

I'm ready to go, yeah

Keep on fightin' for ya'

Like a soldier



Oh, I might get caught up and carried away

You wouldn't wanna have me another way



Ain't nobody know ya'

Like I fuckin' know ya'

Ain't nobody hold ya'

Like I hold ya'

When you're feelin' low, yeah

I'm ready to go, yeah

Keep on fightin' for ya'

Like a soldier



Oh yeah (x3)

For ya' like a soldier



Let me change the vibe

Put it down and comatose

Holy over time

Heaven 'til you overdose

Crossin' every line

Yeah, I'd do it all for you, yeah



Feel the water rise

Build you up a barricade

Till weâ€™re out of time

See it through like cellophane

Never say goodbye

Yeah, I'd do it all for you, yeah



Ain't nobody know ya'

Like I fuckin' know ya'

Ain't nobody hold ya'

Like I hold ya'

When you're feelin' low, yeah

I'm ready to go, yeah

Keep on fighting for ya'

Like a soldier



Oh, I might get caught up and carried away

You wouldn't wanna have me another way



Ain't no body know ya'

Like I fuckin' know ya

Ain't nobody, ain't nobody, ain't nobody...
